user.title: Kokoro TTS – Server
user.description: Enter the URL of your Kokoro-FastAPI server.

data_description.base_url: Do not include a trailing slash or /v1. The integration will discover voices automatically.

voice.title: Kokoro TTS – Voice & Settings
voice.description: Choose the default voice and audio settings.

data_description.voice: Voice names starting with 'a' are American English, 'b' are British English, 'j' are Japanese, 'z' are Mandarin Chinese. You can also mix voices using + (e.g. af_bella+af_sky).
data_description.response_format: MP3 is recommended for broadest HA compatibility.
data_description.lang_code: Override the language/phonemizer. Leave blank for automatic detection based on the voice name.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the Kokoro-FastAPI server. Make sure it is running and the URL is correct.

abort.already_configured: This Kokoro server is already configured.
